skills.skill: Operation of heavy equipment/farming or ranching equipment

duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure state highways are kept safe and drivable for the traveling public at all times.
Perform roadway maintenance activities, roadside activities, sign installation, and pavement marking.
Maintain and repair guardrail systems, structures, equipment, and properties.
Provide on-the-job training and work direction, and maintain documentation.
Respond to emergencies, perform winter maintenance, and provide temporary traffic control through work zones.
Promote a safe work environment and participate in public safety awareness activities.

education_certification.credential: Valid driver's license and the ability to obtain a Class A commercial driver's license (CDL) with a N: Tank Vehicles endorsement within 120 days of hire date
